overview: Katrina Jade performs in a cuckold scene with mysterious hooded men on the lap of her real life partner. Honey Gold is lured into having sex with a stranger from the floor of a surrealover. Angela White is pulled back from the grasp of re-imagined sirens. Kayden Kross and Jillian Janson perform the ultimate tease in a grand champagne room after dark. TRENCHCOATx presents four hardcore stories made more erotic by their ties to real life.
title: Sacrosanct
